contact.title: Contact
contact.more: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. Don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or concerns.

0.question: Can I use your quizzes offline?
0.answer: Right now, our quizzes are only available online.

1.question: What does the service cost?
1.answer: The service is free of charge.

2.question: Do you cover different sections of the Swedish Scholastic Aptitude Test (Högskoleprovet)?
2.answer: Yes, we have quizzes from all sections of the Högskoleprovet.

about.title: About us
about.0: We are a team of passionate individuals striving to make learning fun and effective. Our journey began in a small student room, where we realized that studying can sometimes be monotonous.
about.1: That's why we created a platform that combines interactive learning with the latest AI technology to generate quiz questions.
about.2: Our ambition is to let every user personalize their study experience, share material with others, and together make learning more dynamic. With a strong community behind us, we continue to develop new features and improve our service.
